section.name: BNF Extraction
section.p:
The BNF extraction utility processes the AdqlStoX.jjt file and extracts special comments within the file to compose a set of BNF diagrams which describes ADQL. Currently the utility can be run in two modes.
BNF for the projected ADQL v2.0 Standard
BNF for the aspects of the ADQL v2.0 Standard supported by AstroGrid
